article_node.title: Three Powerhouse Real Teams Unite to Form Benson Crew
article_node.summary: The Real Brokerage Inc. has launched Benson Crew, the largest real estate team in Canada, formed by merging three top-producing teams in Ontario. With 60 professionals and $6 billion in lifetime sales, Benson Crew aims to redefine high-performance real estate through collaboration and innovative strategies. The team emphasizes a culture of support and empowerment for agents, focusing on exceptional client service and plans to expand while mentoring future agents.
